ygData.subject: RE: I DROPPED my Mistmoore Drum!!!!  :(
ygData.msgSnippet: Arrrgh!  That really sucks!  I wish I was on your server - I would come help you fight for another one in MM.  Perhaps you know a lev 50 druid who can help
ygData.messageBody:
Arrrgh! That really sucks! I wish I was on your server - I would come help
you fight for another one in MM. Perhaps you know a lev 50 druid who can
help you.

Makes me think that we should as for a command to allow players to "make"
items "no drop" on command.

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Bard of the 42nd song
somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 20, 2000 2:26 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] I DROPPED my Mistmoore Drum!!!!
:(

Then while running, turning to avoid some other giant
fighters, and switching to my weapons to finish off a giant
with melee, I DROPPED MY MISTMOORE DRUM!!! :(
